Literature.Title: New Antimicrobial Peptides with Repeating Unit against Multidrug-Resistant Bacteria.
Literature.Author: Zhong C, et al.

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Mouse erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=32 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:50% Cell death=32 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=16µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=16µM),Escherichia coli 780(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli 804(MIC=8µM),Acinetobacter baumannii 9931(MIC=4µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 50(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 73(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus 75(MIC=2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=4µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM)
